ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: In that way We insert it into the evildoers' hearts.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: We place in the hearts of sinners (disbelief).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Even so We make a way for it (that is, the Admonition) in the hearts of the culprits (like a hot rod);
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: This is how We cause the hearts of the guilty ones to behave.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: This is how We make the mocking* enter the hearts of the guilty. (* The acts of disbelief.)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Thus We allow it to enter the hearts of the guilty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Thus do We make it to enter into the hearts of the guilty;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: even so We cause it to enter into the hearts of the sinners --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Thus do We make it traverse the hearts of the guilty:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: thus We cause this [habit of mocking] to enter into the hearts of the sinful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Even so we make a way for it in the hearts of the culprits.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: That is how We let it pass through the hearts of the guilty:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Even so do we let it creep into the hearts of the sinners -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Thus do We let it (polytheism and disbelief) enter into the hearts of the Mujrimun [criminals, polytheists, pagans, etc. (because of their mockery at the Messengers)].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: So We make it enter the hearts of the sinners.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Thus We slip it into the hearts of the guilty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Thus do We insert denial into the hearts of the criminals.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [15:12] Thus We cause it to find its way, in other words, in the same way that We have caused denial to enter the hearts of those [individuals], We cause it to enter, into the hearts of the sinners, that is, the disbelievers of Mecca.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Thus do We make it) We leave denial (traverse the hearts of the guilty) the hearts of the idolaters:
